lotusMarks:LotusChain.NAME: Lotus Chain
lotusMarks:LotusChain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each lotusmarks:Lotus_Mark on any enemy.
lotusMarks:LotusChain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each Lotus Mark on any enemy.

lotusMarks:LotusSlash.NAME: Lotus Slash
lotusMarks:LotusSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Lotus Mark.
lotusMarks:LotusSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Lotus Marks.

lotusMarks:LotusStrike.NAME: Lotus Strike
lotusMarks:LotusStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase damage by !M! for every lotusmarks:Lotus_Mark on the enemy.
lotusMarks:LotusStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase damage by !M! for every lotusmarks:Lotus_Mark on the enemy.

lotusMarks:Mark.NAME: Mark
lotusMarks:Mark.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lotus Mark and !M! vulnerable on an enemy.
lotusMarks:Mark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Lotus Marks and !M! vulnerable on an enemy.

lotusMarks:OnTheHunt.NAME: On The Hunt
lotusMarks:OnTheHunt.DESCRIPTION: Gain strength equal to the total number of Lotus Marks on all enemies. NL Exhaust.
lotusMarks:OnTheHunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain strength equal to the total number of Lotus Marks on all enemies. NL Exhaust.

lotusMarks:SeasonOfFire.NAME: Season Of Fire
lotusMarks:SeasonOfFire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to every enemy for each lotusmarks:Lotus_Mark they have.
lotusMarks:SeasonOfFire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to every enemy for each lotusmarks:Lotus_Mark they have.

lotusMarks:SkilledExecution.NAME: Skilled Execution
lotusMarks:SkilledExecution.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack this turn is played an extra number of times equal to the number of lotusmarks:Lotus_Mark on the target.
lotusMarks:SkilledExecution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next attack this turn is played an extra number of times equal to the number of lotusmarks:Lotus_Mark on the target.

lotusMarks:LotusMarchSelectionCard.DESCRIPTION: Add the Lotus Marks Archetype to your Card Draft Pool.
